title: Minister Attaf helds a meeting
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, chaired today, in the presence of the Secretary General, Mr. Amar Balani, a working session with senior officials of the Ministry.

On this occasion, the Minister presented a set of ideas and perceptions on the priorities of foreign policy in the next step, in accordance with the vision and instructions of the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune.

During his speech, the Minister also provided guidance and directives to the senior officials, in order to make a qualitative leap in terms of working methods and decision-making, in accordance with the requirements of the new era and the ambitious goals that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad are attempting to achieve, in concretization of the commitments contained in the program of the President of the Republic aiming at restoring the influence of Algeria and at increasing its influence in its fundamental vital spaces which are Africa, the Arab World and the Mediterranean, and at reinforcing its presence in the various continental, regional and international organizations, through a dynamic and active diplomacy which harmonizes in a creative way the supreme interests of the country and its firm principles in the light of the serious challenges posed by the international contexts.
